title: talon bug
body: it might be a bug, talon's ulti can still go through yasuo's windwall when talon Q yas. I just metion this bug ,if someone have same issue plz remind rito to find it out

replies.body: And it seems yas's windwall blocked talon's ulti
The wall would have to block every part of the ult, since it only damages once. Idk if it works properly or not beyond that though.
